name: Mooi
description:
You receive a call from someone called Charlotte who is trying to escape from some place before she's taken away. With no time for explanations, Charlotte will need your help to make good decisions and find passwords to unlock doors. At the end, we discover her true identity...which is udderly ridiculous!

Mooi is a text-based adventure inspired by Bury Me My Love and the board game Unlock!

Team
